day_1.message: Every expert was once a beginner.

day_5.message: Show up. Even when it’s not perfect

day_6.message: Stay patient and trust your journey.

day_7.message: Curiosity deepens when answers aren’t obvious

day_8.message: Be kind to yourself. You’re doing the best you can

day_10.message: See that's it. Congratulations !!! enik ariyaalo inte kutine
